snippet: A consortium led by the investment fund GO Scale Capital will acquire an 80.1 percent stake in the LED and automotive lighting business.
abstract: Dutch electronics giant Philips agrees to sell controlling stake in its automotive lighting and LED business for as up to $2.9 billion; consortium led by GO Scale Capital would acquire 80.1 percent stake in the stand-alone business.
lead_paragraph: A consortium led by the investment fund GO Scale Capital will acquire an 80.1 percent stake in the LED and automotive lighting business.

headline.main: Philips to Sell Controlling Stake in LED Business for Up to $2.9 Billion
